channel.title: Changing The Server Ip!
channel.description: Uhh, I Have Used A Rune-Warfare Client And Server And Im Not Sure How To Change The Server Ip? This Is My First Ever Private Server, And Also I How Do You Change The Stat On A Ring?

item.title: Changing The Server Ip!
item.dc:creator: @acecanine acecanine

But My Item Thing Is Diff, It Just Says A Load Of Codes?

item.title: Changing The Server Ip!
item.dc:creator: @J_K0_U J K0 U
item.description:
@J_K0_U wrote:

if its a 317 client, go into the files and look for one called GUI.java open it, and search for “serverip” or just “ip” and you will see some thing like “…no-ip.biz” just change it to 127.0.0.1 save compile. to change stat of an item is server-sided, go into source files and go in to a folder called either config or data. Then you should see the file call item.cfg. that holds all the items and there props. just change the number after the item, should look like this

[code]item = 1949 Fighter_hat A_partially_charged_rod. 1 35 1 5 5 5 -7 -7 27 29 26 -3 28 0 0[\code]

some of the number are stuff like str bonuses and def bonuses and stuff. have a mess around with it :).

btw did you want the stats for a perfect ring, like 99999 str bonus?[/code]

Read full topic
